description: Lists the organizational units (OUs) in a parent organizational unit or root. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

parameters.name: ParentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the root or OU whose child OUs you want to list. The regex pattern for a parent ID string requires one of the following: Root - A string that begins with 'r-' followed by from 4 to 32 lowercase letters or digits. Organizational unit (OU) - A string that begins with 'ou-' followed by from 4 to 32 lowercase letters or digits (the ID of the root that the OU is in). This string is followed by a second '-' dash and from 8 to 32 additional lowercase letters or digits.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnits
nested_items.description: A list of the OUs in the specified root or parent OU.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) associated with this OU. The ID is unique to the organization only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this OU.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of this OU.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null.
